definition: people who live and make a living on boats

sentences.english: Select your boat with care and circumspection .
sentences.chinese: 選擇您的船民與照顧和謹慎。

sentences.english: Tommy, who has a REAL BOAT, needed some plastic material for his bilges .
sentences.chinese: 張宇人，誰具有真正的船民，需要一些塑料材料，他。

sentences.english: She was later used as a training boat, and was scuttled at the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 她後來被用來作爲訓練的船民，並破壞在戰爭結束。

sentences.english: There were also a few misc holes all over the boat that were not on my boat.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些其它洞都船民被認爲是不對我的船民。

sentences.english: There were also a few misc holes all over the boat that were not on my boat.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些其它洞都船民被認爲是不對我的船民。

sentences.english: A number of vietnamese boat people staged a protest against repatriation.
sentences.chinese: 不少越南船民抗議遣返原地。

sentences.english: She is happily married to her husband Joe, a business executive and avid boater .
sentences.chinese: 她愉快地與結婚對她的丈夫喬，商業主管和熱中船民。

sentences.english: I thought the bottom of the boat would be the best place to start the scribing .
sentences.chinese: 我以爲底部的船民將最好的地方，開始切割。

sentences.english: Mahmood stayed with the boaters on their vacation.
sentences.chinese: 馬哈茂德與度假的船民在一起。

definition: fishing boat/same as 漁船|渔船
to make one's living from the sea
